Tool Name: SQL Data Guard: Enforcing Safe LLM-to-Database Interactions via Inline or MCP Deployment
Description: SQL Data Guard, introduced at Black Hat Asia 2025, protects against insecure SQL by validating and rewriting queries to enforce access restrictions and block injection payloads. As LLMs increasingly generate SQL dynamically, we extend sql-data-guard with a containerized application that secures MCP-based systems.
